name: Sobreviva - Low Poly
detailed_description:
EN-US

with two random weapons, destroy your enemies on a floating island!

start on an island, your goal will be to get to the island in the middle of the map, and when you get there open the boxes that will be there with your collision, and then let your reflexes take care of you;

you can choose the map you want to play, and you can also change your skins in the inventory tab, every 3 matches you win will give you the chance to get skins in your inventory (inside of game);

there of instant lifes that will help you survive on this hostile island;

you will be born with random items, all with their right times to attack and different damage to increase a little in their gameplay;

within the game will have several rounds to know which player is the best player at the moment, the game ends only when a player gets 5 (five) points and if another player gets the same score in the game (with 1 (one) point left to win the game), players must reach 6 (six) points and so on successively.

exist grenades for you explode your enemy. You will play the grenade with the mouse's right button every five seconds, there a indicator for when you can play;

the game has a system for new players that you must do before playing;

Updates are made every month for at least ... so, try this game to give us tips on how to improve.

short_description: with two random weapons, destroy your enemies on a floating island!
supported_languages: Portuguese-Brazil, English, German, Spanish, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: intel Celeron
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nenhuma
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: nenhuma
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: intel core i5, AMD Fx6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia Geforce GTX600 series
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: nenhuma
